alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:27AM CDT until June 14 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 126 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Humphrey, or 12 miles south of Stuttgart, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Almyra... St. Charles... Palmer... De Witt... Almyra Airport... Crocketts Bluff... Ragtown... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Indian Bay... Pine City... Lodge Corner... Lawrenceville... Cross Roads in Monroe County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
